text: The 1929 Tour of the Basque Country was the sixth edition of the Tour of the Basque Country cycle race and was held from 7 August to 11 August 1929. The race started in Bilbao and finished in Las Arenas. The race was won by Maurice De Waele. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 35" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 16" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 17' 14" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 28' 22" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 29' 11" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 36' 53" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 44' 18" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 46' 48" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 53' 48" |} |} ==References== 1929 Bas
title: 1929 Tour of the Basque Country
